report.title: Occurrences Download using standard filters inc. sensitive
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the standard report filter parameters. Sensitive data returned at full precision so use with caution, e.g. for LRC record download.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: uploadFolder
param.description: Image upload folder on the warehouse including the trailing slash

param.name: warehouse_id
param.description: Unique identifier code for the warehouse which can be prepended to occurrence IDs to make a globally unique record key

param.name: vice_county_location_type_term
param.preprocess: SELECT id FROM cache_termlists_terms WHERE termlist_title='Location types' AND term='#vice_county_location_type_term#'

column.name: projection
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(s.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: output_sref_projection
column.sql: case onf.output_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(onf.output_sref_system) end

column.name: vicecounty_number
column.sql: (SELECT string_agg(vc.code, '; ') FROM locations vc WHERE vc.location_type_id=#vice_county_location_type_term# AND vc.name NOT LIKE '%+%' AND vc.id = ANY(o.location_ids))

column.name: vicecounty
column.sql: (SELECT string_agg(vc.name, '; ') FROM locations vc WHERE vc.location_type_id=#vice_county_location_type_term# AND vc.name NOT LIKE '%+%' AND vc.id = ANY(o.location_ids))

column.name: determiner
column.sql: CASE WHEN onf.attr_det_full_name IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN onf.attr_det_last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE onf.attr_det_last_name || COALESCE(', ' || onf.attr_det_first_name, '') END ELSE onf.attr_det_full_name END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE o.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END

column.name: images
column.sql: case when onf.media is null then null else '#uploadFolder#' || replace(onf.media, ',', ', #uploadFolder#') end

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN 'Accepted' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Unconfirmed' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Input still in progress' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE o.record_status END

column.name: record_substatus
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 1 THEN 'correct' WHEN 2 THEN 'Considered correct' ELSE NULL END WHEN 'C' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 3 THEN 'Plausible' ELSE 'Not reviewed' END WHEN 'R' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 4 THEN 'Unable to verify' WHEN 5 THEN 'Incorrect' ELSE NULL END ELSE NULL END

column.name: query
column.sql: case o.query when 'A' then 'Answered' when 'Q' then 'Queried' end

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END
